Orphapacket.Label: Right inferior vena cava connecting to left-sided atrium

Synonyms.Synonym: Right IVC connecting to left-sided atrium
Right inferior caval vein connecting to left-sided atrium

TextSection.Contents: A rare vascular anomaly characterized by a congenital anomalous connection between the inferior vena cava and the left atrium. Clinical manifestations depend on the presence and nature of additional cardiac defects and include cyanosis dyspnea failure to thrive clubbing of fingers and toes and potentially heart failure.

Parent.Label: Congenital anomaly of the inferior vena cava
